question: In which year, the Constitution ofÂ  Costa Rica got adopted?
explanation: In 1949, the Constitution of Costa Rica got adopted. In 1948, Costa Rican Civil War took place between the Government of Costa Rica and a part of the Costa Rican military under Jose Figueres Ferrer against the government's decision to annul the results of 1948 General Elections of Costa Rica. The rebel army won the civil war and elected a new constituent assembly to produce the 1949 Constitution of Costa Rica.
